pages.text: Innama An-Nasi'u Ziyadatun Fi Al-Kufri Yuallu Bihi Al-Ladhina Kafaru Yuhillunahu `Amaan Wa Yuharrimunahu `Amaan Liyuwati'u `Iddata Ma Harrama Allahu Fayuhillu Ma Harrama Allahu Zuyyina Lahum Su'u 'A`malihim Wa Allahu La Yahdi Al-Qawma Al-Kafirina

Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Ma Lakum 'Idha Qila Lakum Anfiru Fi Sabili Allahi Aththaqaltum 'Ila Al-'Ari 'Araitum Bil-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Mina Al-'Akhirati Fama Mata`u Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Fi Al-'Akhirati 'Illa Qalilun
Illa Tanfiru Yu`adhibkum `Adhabaan 'Alimaan Wa Yastabdil Qawmaan Ghayrakum Wa La Taurruhu Shay'aan Wa Allahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun

Illa Tansuruhu Faqad Nasarahu Allahu 'Idh 'Akhrajahu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Thaniya Athnayni 'Idh Huma Fi Al-Ghari 'Idh Yaqulu Lisahibihi La Tahzan 'Inna Allaha Ma`ana Fa'anzala Allahu Sakinatahu `Alayhi Wa 'Ayyadahu Bijunudin Lam Tarawha Wa Ja`ala Kalimata Al-Ladhina Kafaru As-Sufla Wa Kalimatu Allahi Hiya Al-`Ulya Wa Allahu `Azizun Hakimun
